answers.answer: Please make arrangements to see an ophthalmologist in person right away.  Obviously you have a significant problem going on and I'm sure you understand you need to be seen in person.  Good Luck.MJK MD

question: Not too long ago my right eye went completely blurry.  Three weeks prior to this I was violently attacked by police officers.  I did slam the ground with my head a few times.  Anyhow, my vision in the right eye is not getting any better.  A friend of mine noticed a blue dot in or covering my pupil.  I'm going to the doctor soon now that I'm not incarscerated any longer.  Doctors in county facilities(jail) don't care much about their residents.  I'm very concerned that my eye is dying and i'm going blind.  I do have concerns about diabetes.  My last three toes on each foot are kind of numb(no familty history).  I tried to get a basic glucose test done in jail, but like I said, they just didn't care.  So please let me know what you think.  The blue blot in my pupil (when light is reflecting from a distance) is getting me worried.  I cannot see anything out of that eye but maybe blotchy lights only at night.  During the day I can see the light of daylight, but no details.  Please Help !!
title: Blurry Vision in my right eye
